originalText.text: Dr. Tanovic was recommended to me for my post-mastectomy reconstruction surgery. She is so thoughtful, warm, and genuine. She gives you all the time you need to discuss your unique situation, your goals, your anatomy, and anything else on your mind. Not only is she a wonderful human, she is also an extremely skilled surgeon. Her use of fat transfer and fat stem cells is brilliant and precise. It's even restored sensation in areas typically indefinitely numb post-mastectomy. My other doctors have been wow-ed by my surgical outcome, scar healing, and final results. Her goal is to give you a beautiful outcome so that you don't even remember you ever had surgery, and I am absolutely getting those results. Anyone looking to get the best outcome should work with her and anyone who is disappointed with their plastic surgery should see her to fix it.

originalText.text: Absolutely, LOVE Dr.Tanovic!! I was looking for a plastic surgeon for a breast reduction. I had seen two male doctors prior to Dr. Tanovic and I just didn't feel like they understood what I was looking for. When I went to see Dr. Tanovic, when I tell you this was the longest non rushed consult I ever endured, I am not exaggerating. We were in there for at least a FULL hour, she explained everything, she answered all my questions and addressed my concerns. She even drew out how my scars would look so I can get a visual of what she is going to do. Honestly, I couldn't be MORE HAPPY! I went from a double E to full C and I will be forever thankful to her. It also helps that her office is so nice and helpful. This place is the whole package! So happy I found them. A ++

originalText.text: I recently had an incredible visit at Dr. Tanovic's new office with her team. Andreea was my PA and she was exceptional. From start to finish, everyone was nothing short of remarkable. I'm excited to recommend this office to friends and family!!

text.text: I recently had an incredible visit at Dr. Tanovic's new office with her team. Andreea was my PA and she was exceptional. From start to finish, everyone was nothing short of remarkable. I'm excited to recommend this office to friends and family!!

originalText.text: I recently visited this clinic for a botox procedure and was thoroughly impressed! The staff was not only attentive and personable but also added a touch of personality that made me feel at ease. The doctor and PAs showcased impressive knowledge, addressing all my questions about skincare, botox, and facial procedures. My botox procedure itself felt nearly effortless, reflecting their expertise. I'll be returning for another procedure without a doubt!

originalText.text: Dr. Tanovic, her PAs, and her staff each provide phenomenal care in aesthetics, plastic, and reconstructive surgery. Dr. Tanovic’s expertise is unmatched! Love this office for all my cosmetic needs
